subject: SIMSONN PC USB 7+R H Simulator Gear Shifter firmware issue
description_text:
Hello I have the following product from yourselves  (  SIMSONN PC USB 7+R H Simulator Gear Shifter )
But I think the firmware has messed up, its only registering the following gears ( in game and in control panel )  - 1/3/4 and nothing else.

I have tried using FreeJoy Configurator<https://github.com/FreeJoy-Team/FreeJoyConfiguratorQt> but had no luck fixing the issue.
By any chance you have a pre made firmware file I could use to reflash it.

Any help would be appreciated
Kind regards
Matt

conversations.body_text: Hi Matt Phyall, Please send a screenshot of the FreeJoy device connection interface. I can provide a recovery file to help restore it — no worries, we’ll help you fix it.
